name: WebGLRenderingContext.getShaderPrecisionFormat
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.getShaderPrecisionFormat() method of the WebGL API returns a new WebGLShaderPrecisionFormat object describing the range and precision for the specified shader numeric format.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glGetShaderPrecisionFormat' in OpenGL ES 2.0.
